description: Potato salad like you've never seen it before. These rolls filled with baked potato salad and cheese will be an instant hit. Perfect for an easy dinner.
name: Speedy Creamy Potato Salad Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 Woolworths crusty jumbo lunch bread rolls
1 cup Woolworths shredded tasty cheese, roughly chopped
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Slice 2cm off tops of rolls. Remove bread from centre of rolls, leaving 1cm border. Place rolls on a baking tray. Bake for 10 minutes or until rolls are crisp.

Meanwhile, place potato salad and half of the cheese in a large bowl and stir to combine. Divide potato salad mixture among hollowed rolls. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until heated through and golden on top.
Meanwhile, prepare salad kit according to packet instructions. Sprinkle rolls with parsley and serve with salad.
